name: ClickUp Task Extractor - Issues Branch Status
observations: All three PRs successfully cherry-picked onto issues branch: #71 (ETA automation), #76 (AI summary timing), #77 (markdown line breaks)
All 211+ tests passing (211 tests verified as of latest test run)
1Password integration fully functional with multi-account support
Application builds and runs successfully with all features integrated
Ready for final merge from issues branch to main
Commit de094be: Fixed all auth tests to use subprocess.run() instead of deprecated check_output()

name: 1Password Integration Implementation
observations: Auth module uses subprocess.run(capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10) for better error handling
Implements multi-stage fallback: CLI arg -> env var -> 1Password SDK (async) -> 1Password CLI -> prompt
Detects and handles multiple 1Password accounts: catches 'multiple accounts' error and retries with --account my.1password.com
Proper exception handling for FileNotFoundError (CLI not installed), TimeoutExpired (timeout), and generic exceptions
Different error messages for executable vs Python users
Returns None on any error instead of raising exceptions to allow graceful fallback
Mock tests updated to use CompletedProcess-like MagicMock objects instead of strings

name: Test Suite Status
observations: 18/18 auth tests passing (100%)
211/211 total tests passing
All test mocks migrated from subprocess.check_output to subprocess.run
Tests cover: SDK fallback, CLI fallback, multiple accounts handling, whitespace stripping, error messages
Logging behavior verified at debug, info, and error levels
No test failures or warnings in pytest output

observations: ✅ ETA automation (PR #71) - cherry-picked commit 67a4361 + timezone fix 664deea
